name: ProfessionalDesignation
title: Professional Designation
description: Industry-recognized professional designations and certifications for practitioners in the property and casualty field.

concept.definition: Chartered Property Casualty Underwriter — an advanced designation covering underwriting, risk management, and ethics.
Associate in Risk Management — focuses on identifying, analyzing, and treating organizational exposures.
Certified Insurance Counselor — a practitioner-oriented program emphasizing commercial and personal lines expertise.
Associate in Commercial Underwriting — focuses on commercial lines underwriting principles and practices.
Associate in General Insurance — an introductory designation covering foundational industry knowledge.
Accredited Adviser in Insurance — focuses on agency management and advanced sales techniques.
Associate in Claims — focuses on claims handling, investigation, and settlement.
Registered Professional Liability Underwriter — specializes in professional liability and errors & omissions coverage.
Certified Risk Manager — focuses on enterprise risk management practices.
Certified Insurance Service Representative — an entry-level designation for agency customer service professionals.
Chartered Insurance Professional — a Canadian designation administered by the Insurance Institute of Canada.
Fellow Chartered Insurance Professional — the advanced Canadian designation from the Insurance Institute of Canada.
